1.title: Basic Syntax and Structure
1.description: Learn the foundational syntax and structure of JavaScript, including how to write basic commands and statements.

1.title: Variables and Data Types
1.description: Explore different data types in JavaScript and how to use variables to store data.

1.title: Operators
1.description: Understand the different operators in JavaScript for performing arithmetic, comparison, and logical operations.

1.title: Control Structures: Conditional Statements
1.description: Learn how to use conditional statements like if-else to control the flow of your program.

1.title: Control Structures: Loops
1.description: Explore how to use different types of loops (for, while, do-while) for repeating actions in your code.

1.title: Functions: Basics
1.description: Learn how to define and call functions, a fundamental aspect of structuring JavaScript code.

1.title: Functions: Parameters and Return Values
1.description: Understand how to pass data to functions and use return values.

1.title: Scope and Closure
1.description: Explore the concepts of scope and closure in JavaScript and how they affect the accessibility of variables.

1.title: Working with Arrays: Basics
1.description: Learn about arrays, how to create them, and basic methods to manipulate array data.

1.title: Working with Arrays: Advanced Methods
1.description: Delve into more advanced array methods and techniques for handling array data.

1.title: Object-Oriented JavaScript: Objects and Properties
1.description: Understand how to create objects in JavaScript and work with their properties.

1.title: Object-Oriented JavaScript: Methods and 'this' Keyword
1.description: Learn about defining methods in objects and the use of the 'this' keyword.

1.title: Asynchronous JavaScript: Callbacks
1.description: Get introduced to asynchronous programming and how to use callbacks.

1.title: Asynchronous JavaScript: Promises
1.description: Explore the concept of Promises in JavaScript for handling asynchronous operations.

1.title: Asynchronous JavaScript: Async/Await
1.description: Understand how to use the async and await keywords for writing asynchronous code in a more readable way.

1.title: Error Handling and Debugging
1.description: Learn about techniques for handling errors and debugging JavaScript code.

1.title: Best Practices
1.description: Discover best practices in JavaScript coding for writing efficient and maintainable code.

1.title: Modern JavaScript Features
1.description: Explore modern JavaScript features introduced in ES6 and beyond for more powerful and concise coding.

2.title: HTML Fundamentals
2.description: Learn the basic structure of a webpage using HTML5. Understand elements, tags, attributes, and the document structure.

2.title: Semantic HTML
2.description: Explore the use of semantic elements in HTML5 for meaningful web page structure and improved accessibility.

2.title: CSS Basics
2.description: Introduction to CSS for styling web pages. Understand selectors, properties, and values.

2.title: CSS Box Model
2.description: Dive into the CSS box model concept, including margins, borders, padding, and content areas, and how they affect element layout.

2.title: Flexbox and Grid Layouts
2.description: Learn about modern layout tools in CSS: Flexbox for one-dimensional layouts and Grid for two-dimensional layouts.

2.title: Responsive Web Design
2.description: Understand how to create responsive layouts using CSS media queries to adapt to different screen sizes and devices.

2.title: DOM Manipulation with JavaScript
2.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to select, modify, and interact with HTML elements via the Document Object Model (DOM).

2.title: Event Handling in JavaScript
2.description: Discover how to handle user interactions in web pages through events and event listeners in JavaScript.

2.title: Web Forms and Validation
2.description: Explore how to create interactive forms in HTML and validate form data using both HTML5 and JavaScript.

2.title: Fetching Data with JavaScript
2.description: Learn to use the Fetch API in JavaScript for making HTTP requests and handling responses from web servers.

2.title: Web Accessibility
2.description: Understand the principles of web accessibility to create websites that are usable by people with various disabilities.

2.title: SEO Basics
2.description: Learn the fundamentals of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for improving website visibility in search engines.

2.title: Performance Optimization
2.description: Explore techniques for optimizing the performance of web pages, including loading times and rendering efficiency.

3.title: Understanding JSX
3.description: Learn about JSX syntax, embedding expressions in JSX, and JSX vs. HTML differences.

links.name: Introduction to JSX by React Documentation
JSX in Depth by React Documentation
9.5 Intro to Node (pt. 1)
9.5 Intro to Create React App
9.5 Use of Components and Fragments

3.title: Props and State
3.description: Explore how to pass data to components using props and manage internal state.

links.name: ReactJS Tutorial - Props and State by Academind
ReactJS Tutorial - Understanding State & Props by The Net Ninja
9.5 Intro to Props
9.5 Rendering Multiple Items
9.5 Rendering Multiple Items (addendum)
9.5 Conditional Rendering (pt. 1)
9.5 Conditional Rendering (pt. 2)

3.title: Creating Functional Components
3.description: Understand how to create and use functional components in React.

links.name: ReactJS Tutorial - Functional Components by Codevolution
React Functional Components by The Net Ninja
9.5 Functional Components

3.title: Class Components
3.description: Learn about class components, their syntax, and when to use them over functional components.

links.name: ReactJS Tutorial - Class Components by Programming with Mosh
React Class Components by Codevolution

3.title: useState Hook
3.description: Learn about managing state in functional components using the useState hook.

links.name: React Hooks Tutorial - useState() Hook by Academind
9.5 useState (pt. 1)
9.5 useState (pt. 2)

3.title: useEffect Hook
3.description: Understand the useEffect hook for side effects in functional components.

links.name: React Hooks Tutorial - useEffect() Hook by Academind

3.title: Basic Routing
3.description: Learn how to set up basic routing and navigate between pages in a React application.

links.name: React Router Tutorial | React For Beginners by Academind

3.title: Route Parameters
3.description: Understand how to use route parameters for dynamic routing.

links.name: React Router Tutorial | Route Parameters by The Net Ninja

3.title: Nested Routes
3.description: Explore the concept of nested routes for complex application structures.

links.name: React Router Nested Routes Tutorial by Codevolution

3.title: Context API
3.description: Learn about the Context API for prop drilling and state management across components.

links.name: React Context & useContext() Hook Tutorial by Academind

3.title: Using Axios for API Requests
3.description: Understand how to make API requests using Axios, a promise-based HTTP client.

3.title: Handling Async Operations
3.description: Explore patterns for handling asynchronous operations and updating state accordingly.

3.title: Mounting Phase
3.description: Learn about the mounting phase in class components, including the constructor, render, and componentDidMount methods.

3.title: Updating Phase
3.description: Understand the updating phase, focusing on how and when a component updates.

3.title: Unmounting Phase
3.description: Explore the unmounting phase, including the componentWillUnmount method.

3.title: Higher-Order Components
3.description: Learn about higher-order components (HOCs) for reusing component logic.

3.title: Render Props
3.description: Understand the render props pattern for sharing dynamic functionality between components.

3.title: Compound Components
3.description: Explore the compound component pattern for flexible component composition.
